DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Benralizumab reduce number asthma exacerbation patient remain uncontrolled medium dose ICS-LABA .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Benralizumab Added Medium-dose Inhaled Corticosteroid Plus LABA Patients With Uncontrolled Asthma
